format.description: Format defines the AWS logs format. Current valid values are: - cloudwatch - vpcflow - s3access - waf - cloudtrail - elbaccess

vpc_flow_log.description: Deprecated: use VPCFlowLogConfig instead. It will be removed in v0.138.0

file_format.description: VPC flow logs sent to S3 have support for file format in plain text or parquet. Default is plain text. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/flow-logs-s3-path.html.
VPC flow logs sent to S3 have support for file format in plain text or parquet. Default is plain text. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/vpc/latest/userguide/flow-logs-s3-path.html.
